serverInfo.name: EuropeanUnion-VIES
serverInfo.title: European Union VIES (Check a VAT number)
serverInfo.description: European Union VIES provides access to official VAT registration information from EU Member States. It checks whether a VAT number is currently registered for intra-EU transactions and returns basic status details. Results depend on the availability of national services. It does not confirm business identity or guarantee correctness beyond VAT validity.
